renewed-contributions.title: The Man With Pin-Point Eyes

renewed-contributions.title: Bonds of the Northland
renewed-contributions.note: Title as given on cover.  CCE renewal record gives title as 'Ofaafo', a word that appears in the cover illustration above the title.

renewed-contributions.title: The Masterman
renewed-contributions.note: Issue as given in a 1959 CCE renewal record.  FictionMags places this part instead in the March 18, 1933 issue, for which a 1959 renewal would be filed too early.  Author is Frederick Faust writing under a pseudonym.

renewed-contributions.title: The Masterman
renewed-contributions.note: Issue as given in FictionMags.  The only renewal we have found in the CCE was filed in 1959, too early for a 1933 publication, and claims this installment was published in the March 19, 1932 issue.  Author is Frederick Faust writing under a pseudonym.

comment: Pick up contributions in the Jan-Jun 1961 issue.
additional-note: The name of this periodical changed from Argosy All-Story Weekly to the Argosy in October 1929, the month that a new All-Story magazine began.
